list.name: Default
list.comment: - fixed code in login.php - password check (serverside) in register.php - renaming of some classes and files - serverside to use non hard coded userid (for testing) - fixed missing datatables sort images

task.summary: Started getting ready on how to do a secure way to login, and create a user account. I am currently working on the session aspect which needs ot be looked into. soon after i can work on making the login work with the data base. going off my friend sean's sample code with secure type logins, i need work on the sessions and how they connect to the successful redirections after logging in. also test the password hashing auth
- Partial session implementation - Login page code updated - OO code conversions
- Working login/logout system - updated hashing function - temp welcome message with login
- Fixed sessions DB entry for each session - Added redirect for pages that should not be accessed
- Added PHPUnit (php unit testing) - Added QUnit (javascript unit testing)

- Added Unit Testing for password verification using PHPUnit
- also did a few class names renaming
- Added missing js code to load data tables
- Converted CDN to local files for more security

- fixed code in login.php - password check (serverside) in register.php - renaming of some classes and files - serverside to use non hard coded userid (for testing) - fixed missing datatables sort images
